channel.title: Drift Racing?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Drift Racing?"

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: Well that pandabear can Drift Race is because the voice actor of Genma in Naruto, which is pandabear) is the same as Sanji in One Piece.

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: Cobrakai is most likely based on the "vaizard" power up later in the series.

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: Details aren't available publicly yet.

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: has he said how it is done? is it just a speical mission after you rescue shorty? and I think I heard it was gunna be so hard that you practicly going to have to be S2 but does that mean its S2 only?

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: McMasters all but confirmed that CobraKai gives extra range. Along with the new awesome that is Shikai and Bankai, that should be very juicy.

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: I'm guessing extra range, personally.

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded:
lol sadface?

no, determined face. Think of how great it will be. A lvl after bankai will have to be truly glorious.

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: Cobrakai? Sounds like there's gonna be MOAR work to do for it than for "Adventures on the Other Side"â€¦ :sadface:

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded:
Or is a reference to the Karate Kid movies. ;)

Though if they did want to go one up from the Bleach series it would be Vizard I'd think.

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: Cobrakai was made up.

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: cobrakai?? O.o i thought i read all the bleach mangas and actually i still am reading them every week but i never heard of that? when the heck did they talk about that? or did i just miss the word and thats the kinda shinigami-takin-out-a-hollowmask-kinda-transformation?

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded:
yep you are right the mysterious power bloodline is referencing Naruto, every few new chars. in the series they talk about his "mysterious ability to befriend anyone he meets"

I think you are also correct on the items. Masters just seems to like pirates. XD

But hey I am a One piece fanatic so that works for me.

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: Referral items isn't really a quest line, and there's lots of referral items that aren't really one-piece like (Helper Pin, Aura of Gratitude, Aviator Goggles, Coolness Badge, etc). Also, the power granted by Mysterious Power bloodline isn't very one piece (it just makes people like you). Really, it's probably closer to Naruto's ability to make friends in Naruto. And, since the legacy bloodline makes references to Pirates, I'm guessing it's just another set of joke references to things that are just cool.

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded:
I thought that Mysterious Power Bloodline is One piece?

Prize List Items suggest it. Pirate Hat?

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: That's my assumption.

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: When you say Pirates does that mean a One Piece spin-off?

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: Not level 3 allies. The step above Bankai, called Cobrakai.

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: Reaper level 3 allies? or another Reaper mission and pirates?

item.title: Re: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: It's not in the game yet. They are planning on adding it, but I've heard it's after images are added for things, after Reaper Lvl. 3, and after Pirates.

item.title: Drift Racing?
item.content:encoded: Some allies like Bugman allow you to Drift Race(Or so they say) Is drift racing something they plan on adding or what do they do?
